EmailTemplate.description: email notice to customer that ticket routed to main support queue
EmailTemplate.name: Case re-routed back to support
EmailTemplate.subject: Your support issues has been routed to Support from Website Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Your case {!Case.CaseNumber}, regarding {!Case.Subject} sent to Website Support has been forwarded to General Support for escalation and resolution.
If you have any questions on this case, please contact supportteam@vinsolutions.com or (800) 980-7488 option 1 and reference this ticket number.
Your VinSolutions VinCare Team
